reviews.text: We were supposed to stay only 3 days at the Tommy resort, but stayed longer. Fantastic bungalows, the best of Staff. Food cheap and really good.. Nice pool..Nice beach and so close to the bungalows. Really feels like paradise. I have never been so relaxed before. We fellt like we were leaving our family behind when we had to say goodbye to the staff. They had such a great sense of humour and were so nice to us. It's a family owned resort and they are improving alot these days making the resort better and better. It's a really social resort, you will meet a lot of people here. It's not the cheapest on the beach, but the best.. Try the shakes that are fresh made and they just opened up a pool bar where you can enjoy a nice drink.
reviews.title: Fantastic Tommy Resort

likes.liked: — The staff, pool, beach and the bungalows. Everything was perfect.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anyway so we went looking for new accommodations and found Tommy's. The prices were similar (affordable), but the hotel rooms were much cleaner, brighter, and offered more security (in room safe). I had a great sleep in the bed there, and the air con worked well. There was a bit of an issue with the toilet, but the staff fixed it right away. The only other thing was the water pressure was a bit weak, but over all I was happier with the room compared to what we had booked next door, and the staff was always nice when we came into the lobby.
reviews.title: good location,better price!!!

likes.disliked: — we arrived the day of the full moon party and could not get a room until the next day. You had to arrive several days in advance to the party to obtain a room. It cleared out and our room was available right after though :D

reviews.text: It is located right on the beach where the Full Moon party is. No worries though they have the whole beach cleaned within two days after the party.
reviews.title: Location location

reviews.text: The rooms were clean and comfortable with cool air conditioning and english tv channels. They also did laundry very cheap and had internet, travel agent, and spa on sight. The pool was huge and clean right on the beach and directly in front was vollyball nets and a beachfront retsaraunt.
reviews.title: Great Service and Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a group of about 12 people. So the staff of the resort taxied us around on private tours. They took us to a mountain top restaraunt, snorkeling at KohMah, and to see elephants. They also helped to arrange us with a Trip to Koh Tao for more snorkeling.
reviews.title: amazing

reviews.text: The best part about the resort was they let us have a wedding there. They set up the ceremony on the beach, ordered the flowers, supplied audio equiptment and of course served the food. The have a hollowed out saleboat that has a mini nightclub inside of it with a huge bar and dancefloor on the top. This is where the wedding was held.
reviews.title: 100% Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The haad rin beach is absolutely great for swiming. Regarding the Tommy beach-bungalow I must say following: the bathroom/toilet was very dirty and the air-condition did not work all the time. The staff of Tommy's Resort is very unfriendly and not helpful at all. All they want is your money and they do not care if you like it or not. This poor attitude from the staff takes away some of the fun of staying at Tommy's unfortunately. That is my opinion.
reviews.title: Great location - poor customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We came to Hadrin a few days before the full moon party and I'm so happy because it was so much fun. The location is perfect and the evenings in the beach before the party were great. the service is 100%, they were so helpful with everything from cloth we lost to travel and general info. We stayed at the rooms in the second Flore to save money and it was very good and clean room, just near the swimming pool (that was a very nice one) and I could see the beach from the balcony. The breakfast was average but the food in the restaurant was fine. I would defiantly come beck (next time with my kids..)
reviews.title: wonderful hotel, I didn't want to leave..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a month in Thailand and spent five days at Tommys Resort. We paid 350 euros for a 'superior' bungalow with TV and air con. I agree with the other reviewers on it being a great location for Full Moon and I also agree that the staff were really friendly however thats were it ends. The bungalow smelled musty. We had cockroaches and we also had a mouse. The pool looks lovely but after seeing a guy gather all his flem in his mouth and spit it in the pool I decided not to go in. TV didn't work for most of our stay and we ended up checking out a day early and moving on to Koh Tao. If you're 18 years old and don't mind the odd coackroach then this is the place for you but personally I thought it was a kip. This was my second time in Koh Phangan and if I ever go back I would definitely stay on the sunset side of Hadrin. Its only about a 10 minute walk away and is so much nicer.
reviews.title: don't believe everything you read
